references.title: Whole genome variation in 27 Mexican indigenous populations, demographic and biomedical insights

sections.heading: Mexican indigenous populations,
sections.text:
demographic and biomedical insights
Israel Aguilar-Ordoñez, Fernando Pérez-Villatoro, Humberto Garcı́a-Ortiz, Francisco Barajas-Olmos, Judith Ballesteros-Villascán, Ram González-Buenfil, Cristobal Fresno, Alejandro Garcı́arrubio, Juan Carlos Fernández-López, Hugo Tovar, Enrique Hernández-Lemus, Lorena Orozco, Xavier Soberón, Enrique Morett
In the Data Availability statement, the point of contact for genome sequence data access
requests is incomplete. The point of contact should include Professor Lorena Orozco (loroz-
co@inmegen.gob.mx).
Reference 1. Aguilar-Ordoñez I, Pérez-Villatoro F, Garcı́a-Ortiz H, Barajas-Olmos F, Ballesteros-Villascán J, et al.
(2021) Whole genome variation in 27 Mexican indigenous populations, demographic and biomedical insights. PLoS ONE 16(4): e0249773. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0249773 PMID: 33831079
